item.description:
TONIGHT @ PALMER'S TAVERN: GROOVE AUTHORITY
or
THE RIVER SITY BAND

WHY BOTH? The newspaper ad reads: Groove Authority. the website: River City band.
BOTH ARE EXCELLENT!

Music begins @ 9pm

No Cover Charge

Palmer's has been voted "BEST BAR NORTH OF BOSTON" several times. It's easy to see why.. Reasonably priced drinks.... OH, try the Pomegranate Martini or Cosmo.. To die for! Food is innovative and excellent.. they feature the best local talent.
It's small... gets very crowded and warm. this all adds to it's charm.

*NOTE: I will try to be there earlier to snag a table. If anyone can arrive earlier? that would be great: )
I know this is a distance from Worcester area but thought I would include it in case there is
interest.

I hope to see you there!

_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the meetup table sign
item.name: Live Music & Dancing @ Palmer's in Andover
